description: By: Ryan O’Hara The sales world has changed a ton in the past decade. The days of smiling and dialing are dying. We see it everyday. Did you know that if you personalize an email, you are 11 times more likely to get an opp vs not doing personalization? That’s based on sampling thousands of …

ttile: How Does LeadIQ Get Our Data?
description: By: Ryan O’Hara I get a lot folks always asking where does LeadIQ get their data? We do provide an array of cell phones, direct dials, email addresses, and company data.  I can’t give you all the secrets we use, but I can go into it a little bit. Here’s a quick video discussing a …
